pkgmetadata.longdescription: **hpcFlow manages your scientific workflows**Documentation: [https://hpcflow.github.io/docs](https://hpcflow.github.io/docs)## AcknowledgementshpcFlow was developed using funding from the [LightForm](https://lightform.org.uk/) EPSRC programme grant ([EP/R001715/1](https://gow.epsrc.ukri.org/NGBOViewGrant.aspx?GrantRef=EP/R001715/1))
